review: Got this as part of the SlingTV promotion. It's extremely slow and glitchy (long load times / actions aren't snappy / disconnects from Wi-Fi network often when none of my other devices, including a Chromecast, do / etc.). I really dislike using it.The only thing it has going for it over my Chromecast is SlingTV. Even then, however, I have a more pleasant experience watching SlingTV on my computers. Currently, the Fire TV Stick is taking up an HDMI slot on my TV and I'm having trouble finding a good use for it.
author: Kenny O.
